page.title: 19SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: YOUTH UNEMPLOYMENT IS A PROBLEM WHERE 16 YR. OLD SCHOOL LEAVERS ARE JOBLESS. A YOUTH TRAINING SCHEME OF ONE YEAR IS GIVING WORK EXPERIENCE BUT AFTERWARDS BORED JOBLESS TEENAGERS MEET IN KING'S SQUARE OR THE MARKET AREA FOR COMPANY. SOME FIND TROUBLE BY TAKING DRUGS OR SNIFFING GLUE OR BECOMING DRUNK. VANDALISM ESPECIALLY BREAKING WINDOWS OCCURS AT NIGHT. AN INCREASE IN SINGLE PARENT FAMILIES IS CAUSING CONCERN. THE D.H.S.S. GIVES SUPPLEMENTARY BENEFIT TO THE LONG TERM UNEMPLOYED AND THEIR DEPENDENTS. THE WELFARE OF THE ELDERLY PEOPLE IS ENSURED BY BUILDING BLOCKS OF SELF CONTAINED FLATS TO REPLACE ALL SUBSTANDARD HOMES IN THE INNER CITY OR OLDER RESIDENTIAL AREAS,EACH BLOCK HAS A RESIDENT WARDEN TO CARE FOR THEM. THE W.R.V.S. MEALS ON WHEELS SERVICE BRING DAILY HOT MEALS TO INFIRM PENSIONERS.
